授業方法: This course will be conducted on campus.   Students will read and analyze paragraphs and essays, and learn or review the grammar, language, and organizational features of academic writing.  Writing will be taught as a process with attention to pre-writing, multiple draft writing, and peer-review.

第1回: Course information; writing diagnostic (all 14 sessions held face-to-face)
第2回: Complete Venn diagrams pre-writing task (approximately 1 hour)
第3回: Comparison-contrast paragraph: diagramming and using comparatives
第6回: Persuasive essays: example and essay structure analysis
第7回: Pre-writing: choosing a topic and outlining the basic structure
第8回: Forming research questions, finding and evaluation outside sources
第9回: Integrating outside source material. Essay draft writing
Complete the essay body paragraphs (approximately 2 hours)(approximately 1 hour)
第10回: Complete the essay introduction and conclusion paragraphs (approximately 2 hours)
第11回: Add citations and reference list (approximately 1 hour)
第12回: Complete revisions and rewriting, as necessary (approximately 1 hour)
第13回: Make final revision to the complete essay (approximately 1 hour)
